holidays.title: National Pupusa Day
holidays.description: Hearing of National Pupusa Day for the first time? You are in for a tasty treat.

holidays.title: American Fancy Rat & Mouse Day
holidays.description: Join us as we celebrate just how adorable and intelligent fancy rats and mice are.

holidays.title: Chicken Soup for the Soul Day
holidays.description: Chicken Soup for the Soul Day celebrates the victories of people who suffered from loss or pain.

holidays.title: Day of Mourning
holidays.description: Honor those claimed by war and tyranny on the National Day of Mourning.

holidays.title: Deepavali
holidays.description: Let the light bless our homes and hearts on the auspicious day of Deepavali.

holidays.title: Diwali
holidays.description: Lasting over five days, the holiday is celebrated by millions of Hindus, Jains and Sikhs worldwide.

holidays.title: International Tongue Twister Day
holidays.description: We’re not talking about rolling or curling your taste-tester.

holidays.title: Kali Puja
holidays.description: Settle in for a transformative journey into the world of the goddess Kali.

holidays.title: Lakshmi Puja
holidays.description: Chant Lakshmi's mantras to manifest abundance and prosperity in your life!

holidays.title: Naraka Chaturdashi
holidays.description: Indians celebrate the second day of the five-day-long Diwali festival.

holidays.title: National French Dip Day
holidays.description: Tantalize your taste buds with an authentic French dip sandwich on this tasty day.

holidays.title: National Nathaniel Day
holidays.description: Join us as we figure out why we’re celebrating Nathaniels this National Nathaniel Day!

holidays.title: National Pizza with the Works Except Anchovies Day
holidays.description: Toss your dough around, gather your toppings, and celebrate this yummy meal.

holidays.title: Orphan Sunday
holidays.description: Take a stand with people around the world as we shower love on orphans.

holidays.title: Remembrance Sunday
holidays.description: We celebrate fallen war soldiers and their brave acts, which we will never forget.

holidays.title: Sigd Day
holidays.description: Uncover the ancient traditions and history of Jewish communities you didn’t know existed.

holidays.title: World Pneumonia Day
holidays.description: Join us in our pursuit to spread awareness, as your contribution could help save lives.

holidays.title: Anne Hathaway’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let's honor Anne Hathaway, a stunning, aspirational, flexible, and passionate multi-talented actress.

holidays.title: Arianny Celeste’s Birthday
holidays.description: This spectacular model and ring girl has become a well-known name in pop culture.

holidays.title: Cuban Link’s Birthday
holidays.description: This multi-talented star has been able to build an impressive life for herself.

holidays.title: DJ Esco’s Birthday
holidays.description: Currently on a fast track to fame, this music creator is surging ahead.

holidays.title: Grace Kelly’s Birthday
holidays.description: She was a graceful princess both on the screen and in real life.

holidays.title: NayVee Nelson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This young star is shining brightly — she still has a great life ahead of her.

holidays.title: Neil Young’s Birthday
holidays.description: He is definitely one of those who gave us memories through their lyrics.

holidays.title: Noah Wiseman’s Birthday
holidays.description: Learn more about the star of one of the most terrifying horror movies you’ll see.

holidays.title: Omarion’s Birthday
holidays.description: This R&B singer is always ready to take his fans to another level.

holidays.title: Romel Cummings’s Birthday
holidays.description: Romel Cummings was featured in the song ‘Explode’ by Noelia, which was released in August 2017.

holidays.title: Russell Westbrook’s Birthday
holidays.description: A Super Natural athlete, this NBA star has got game on the courts!

holidays.title: Ryan Gosling’s Birthday
holidays.description: No one can combine raw charm and inherent talent like this Hollywood A-lister!

holidays.title: Tonya Harding’s Birthday
holidays.description: This athlete's achievements and reputation have made her a popular figure in pop culture.

holidays.title: xQc’s Birthday
holidays.description: Part determination and part ongoing controversy, this successful Twitch streamer keeps his fans hooked.
